amendment.description: To repeal mandatory funding for the farmers market and local food promotion program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2432 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2432 proposed by Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S4356-2357) To repeal mandatory funding for the farmers market and local food promotion program.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2432 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
